sentences.en: Among these, transcendental methodology was the most fundamental method.
sentences.cn: 其中先验方法论是其最基本的方法.

sentences.en: Few men have had such transcendental capacity to stir the heart of people.
sentences.cn: 很少人有如此超群出众的打动人心的才能.

sentences.en: Gazing at that majestic painting was for me an almost transcendental experience.
sentences.cn: 我凝视着那幅气势磅圸的画,一种堪称超凡的感受油然而生.

sentences.en: He is regarded as one of the great transcendental idealists .
sentences.cn: 他被认为是一位伟大的先验的观念论者。

sentences.en: Heaven: the conscious relationship between man and the transcendental world.
sentences.cn: 天: 人与超越世界的智性关系.

sentences.en: It is entirely proper to classify Kant as a transcendental idealist.
sentences.cn: 把康德化为先驱的唯心主义者是完全正确的.

sentences.en: It is entirly proper to classify Kant as a transcendental idealist.
sentences.cn: 把康德化为先驻的唯心主义者是完全正确的.

sentences.en: Nature supplies some hints, not of the transcendental order but altogether more tantalizing and momentary.
sentences.cn: 自然提供了一些暗示, 不属于超验论,但是要迷人得多,短促得多.

sentences.en: On the other, the transcendental ecstasy derived from the communion of a human being with nature.
sentences.cn: 另一方面表现的是来自人和自然交融之后得到的至高无上的喜悦.

sentences.en: The analysis of discourse operates therefore without reference to the transcendental subject.
sentences.cn: 因此,对话语所作的分析就无需参照先验主体.

sentences.en: The fast and accurate evaluation of transcendental functions ( e . g . exp, log, sin, tan ) is very important in the field of scientific computing.
sentences.cn: 科学计算中的许多领域都需要快速而精确地计算超越函数,即exp 、 log 、 sin 、 tan 等此类函数.

sentences.en: The film has equal parts personal portrait, historical chronicle, and transcendental rumination.
sentences.cn: 里面既有对个人的描述, 也有历史事件, 以及深刻的思考.

sentences.en: The practical and pragmatic gainsay the Utopian and transcendental.
sentences.cn: 实际的和实用的,否定了空想的和先验的东西.

sentences.en: We do not have to adduce this experience of the transcendental.
sentences.cn: 我们不必举出超越的经验.

sentences.en: Well, you are always heroic and transcendental.
sentences.cn: 当然, 你一向是勇敢而超凡入圣的.

words.tran_cn: 卓越的；超常的；出类拔萃的
超越论者的，先验论者的
先验的；[数]卓越的，超越的；超自然的

trans.tran_cn: <数>超越的，卓越的，先验的，抽象的
trans.tran_en: transcendental experiences or ideas are beyond normal human understanding and experience
